mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rb_policy_config (policy_type, policy_name, policy_desc, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) VALUES (#{dto.policyType}, #{dto.policyName}, #{dto.policyDesc}, #{dto.createBy}, NOW(), #{dto.updateBy}, NOW(), #{dto.remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE rb_policy_config SET policy_type = #{dto.policyType}, policy_name = #{dto.policyName}, policy_desc = #{dto.policyDesc}, update_by = #{dto.updateBy}, update_time = NOW(), remark = #{dto.remark} WHERE id = #{dto.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT id, policy_type, policy_name, policy_desc, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark FROM rb_policy_config
AND policy_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dto.policyName}, '%')
ORDER BY update_time DESC
